meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>use up</kanji> or <kanji>exhaust</kanji>, and this verb is <vocabulary>to be used up</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>to be exhausted</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>to run out</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: If something is exhausted it's because you used up <reading>too</reading> (つ) much of it, and now it's all gone.
